text: Cercosaura argulus, the elegant eyed lizard or white-lipped prionodactylus is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is found in Colombia , Ecuador, Bolivia, French Guiana, Peru, and Brazil. ==References== Category:Cercosaura Category:Reptiles described in 1862 Category:Taxa named by Wilhelm Peters
title: Cercosaura argulus
